PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05902010-05-13,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC, 
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectAgri-Recovery - Alberta Pasture Recovery Initiative
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide assistance through the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program under the AgriRecovery Framework to Alberta livestock producers affected by conditions of extreme drought through a contribution under the federal component of the 2010 Canada-Alberta Pasture Recovery Initiative.
AttachmentsAttachment
